about_the_game:
Blouncy is a two-button sidescroller with two objectives; don't fall down, and don't hit the spiky balls. The only problem; you can't stop bouncing. See how far you can go!

Featuring advanced game mechanics such as:
- Gravity!
- Damage!
- Player controlled lateral movement!

Use the arrow keys to move back and forth, and get that number up as high as you can!
detailed_description:
Blouncy is a two-button sidescroller with two objectives; don't fall down, and don't hit the spiky balls. The only problem; you can't stop bouncing. See how far you can go!

Featuring advanced game mechanics such as:
- Gravity!
- Damage!
- Player controlled lateral movement!

Use the arrow keys to move back and forth, and get that number up as high as you can!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu/SteamOS
  • Processor: Something more recent than 2012
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Anything OpenGL 3.3 compatible
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A pair of maracas
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu/SteamOS
  • Processor: Something more recent than 2015
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Something more recent than 2015
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any electronic sound rectangle

short_description: Be a block! Do the bounce! Don't Die!
